content: SPX Metal-cutting diamond blade Ultimate diamond blade for superior cutting performance in metal and other base materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features 30 to 100 times longer-lasting than an abrasive disc – direct productivity increase at the jobsite due to significantly fewer blade exchanges Vacuum-brazed diamonds cut all types of materials – metal, PVC, wood, concrete and stone etc. Health and safety – virtually no disc breakage, less vibration and fewer sparks compared to abrasives Same cutting depth in all base materials for the blades entire lifetime Shockproof and not affected by temperature changes or moisture – no expiration date Applications Demolition, including cutting rebar, steel pipes, rails and metal decking Cutting of handrails, steel structures, steel deck Demolition of pipes, cutting of plastic tubes Rescue applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Angle grinder, Gas saw, Battery cut-off saw Base material: Cast iron, Metal, Steel, Wood, PVC Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Angle grinder, Gas saw, Battery cut-off saw | Base material | Cast iron, Metal, Steel, Wood, PVC | Product Class | Ultimate | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry ### ITEMS- 2200896 - Cutting disc 4.5x7/8 SPX metal - Package Size 1 pc - 2200897 - Cutting disc 5x7/8 SPX metal - Package Size 1 pc - 2200898 - Cutting disc 7x7/8 SPX metal - Package Size 1 pc - 2205729 - Cutting disc 9x7/8 SPX metal - Package Size 1 pc - 2200899 - Cutting disc 12x1 SPX metal - Package Size 1 pc - 2200887 - Cutting disc 14x1 SPX metal - Package Size 1 pc - 2200888 - Cutting disc 16x1 SPX metal - Package Size 1 pc
